content.raw:
I think you may have forgotten to include the rawtactile ros message file. I get this error:

```
#!c++

/home/nkoenig/work/osrf/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:20:41: fatal error: sandia_hand_msgs/RawTactile.h: No such file or directory

```
content.html:
I think you may have forgotten to include the rawtactile ros message file. I get this error:

/home/nkoenig/work/osrf/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:20:41: fatal error: sandia_hand_msgs/RawTactile.h: No such file or directory

content.raw:
can you add
~~~
diff -r 5cb5d0ea0368 ros/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/ros/CMakeLists.txt	Thu May 02 15:38:06 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/CMakeLists.txt	Fri May 03 11:02:42 2013 -0700
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@
 add_subdirectory(multisense_sl_description)
 
 # Construct the ROS_PACKAGE_PATH that we'll need, both at configure and build time.
-set(ROS_PACKAGE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/atlas_msgs:${OSRF_COMMON_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:$ENV{ROS_PACKAGE_PATH})
+set(ROS_PACKAGE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/atlas_msgs:${OSRF_COMMON_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:${SANDIA_HAND_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:$ENV{ROS_PACKAGE_PATH})
 ExternalProject_Add(atlas_msgs
                     UPDATE_COMMAND true
                     PATCH_COMMAND true
~~~
so we don't have to tweak `ROS_PACKAGE_PATH` before compile?
content.html:
can you add

diff -r 5cb5d0ea0368 ros/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/ros/CMakeLists.txt    Thu May 02 15:38:06 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/CMakeLists.txt    Fri May 03 11:02:42 2013 -0700
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@
 add_subdirectory(multisense_sl_description)

 # Construct the ROS_PACKAGE_PATH that we'll need, both at configure and build time.
-set(ROS_PACKAGE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/atlas_msgs:${OSRF_COMMON_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:$ENV{ROS_PACKAGE_PATH})
+set(ROS_PACKAGE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/atlas_msgs:${OSRF_COMMON_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:${SANDIA_HAND_ROS_PACKAGE_PATH}:$ENV{ROS_PACKAGE_PATH})
 ExternalProject_Add(atlas_msgs
                     UPDATE_COMMAND true
                     PATCH_COMMAND true

so we don't have to tweak ROS_PACKAGE_PATH before compile?
